Level 5 Bastion Facility

Prerequisite: Ability to use an Arcane Focus or tool as a Spellcasting Focus

Space: Roomy

Hirelings: 1

Order: Craft

An Arcane Study is a place of quiet research that contains one or more desks and bookshelves.

Arcane Study Charm. After spending a Long Rest in your Bastion, you gain a magical Charm (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{Supernatural Gifts}) that lasts for 7 days or until you use it. The Charm allows you to cast Identify without expending a spell slot or using Material components. You can’t gain this Charm again while you still have it.

Craft Options. When you issue the Craft order to this facility, choose one of the following options:

Craft: Arcane Focus. You commission the facility’s hireling to craft an Arcane Focus. The work takes 7 days and costs no money. The Arcane Focus remains in your Bastion until you claim it.

Craft: Book. You commission the facility’s hireling to craft a blank book. The work takes 7 days and costs you 10 GP. The book remains in your Bastion until you claim it.

Craft: Magic Item (Arcana). If you are level 9+, you can commission the facility’s hireling to craft a Common or an Uncommon magic item chosen by you from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItemList.JournalEntryPage.1asrgLIXBkZK96Uz#arcana-tables]{Arcana tables}. The facility has the tool required to craft the item, and the hireling has proficiency with that tool as well as proficiency in the Arcana skill. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{Crafting Magic Items} for the time and money that must be spent to craft the item. If the item allows its user to cast any spells from it, you must craft the item yourself (the facility’s hireling can assist), and you must have all those spells prepared every day you spend crafting the item.
translation:
5级据点设施

先决条件：可以使用奥术法器或可以将工具作为施法法器

空间：宽敞

雇员：1

指令：制造

奥术研究室是一个安静的实验场所，包含一台或更多的书桌与书架。

秘学护咒。 当你在据点内进行一次长休后，你获得一个魔法护咒 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.U9qU1oUFTPAK7g50]{（见第三章“超自然恩惠”一节）}，此护咒持续7天或持续至你将其使用为止。此护咒允许你施展一次鉴定术 ，无需消耗法术位也无需准备施法材料。你无法在已拥有该护咒时再次获得它。

制造选项。 当你对此设施下达制造指令时，从以下选项中选择一项：

制造：奥术法器。 你委托该设施的雇员制造一个奥术法器 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulAlchemists]{奥术法器}，这项工作需要7天且无需花费金钱。在你领取它之前，造好的法器会留在你的据点内。

制造：书卷。 你委托该设施的雇员制造一本空白的书。这项工作需要7天并且需要花费10 GP。在你将其领取前，造出的书会留在你的据点内。

制造：魔法物品(奥秘)。 如果你的等级达到或高于9级，你可以委托此设施的雇员制造一件由你选择的普通或非普通魔法物品，该物品必须来自 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItemList.JournalEntryPage.1asrgLIXBkZK96Uz#arcana-tables]{奥秘表格}。此设施拥有制造该物品所需的工具，而其雇员拥有该工具的熟练以及奥秘技能的熟练。参考 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{制造魔法物品}来决定制造该物品所需的时间与金钱花费。如果该物品允许使用者用它施展任何法术，你必须亲自制造它（设施雇员可以协助你），并且在制造该物品期间，你每天都必须准备所有该物品可以施展的法术。

Level 13 Bastion Facility

Prerequisite: None

Space: Roomy

Hirelings: 1

Order: Research

An Archive is a repository of books, maps, and scrolls. It is usually attached to a Library behind a locked or secret door.

Research: Helpful Lore. When you issue the Research order to this facility, you commission the facility’s hireling to search the Archive for lore. The work takes 7 days. The hireling gains knowledge as if they had cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLegendLore]{Legend Lore} spell, then shares this knowledge with you the next time you speak with them.

Reference Book. Your Archive contains one copy of a reference book, which gives you a benefit while you and the book are in your Bastion. You can choose one of the following options (your DM might make more options available):

Bigby’s Handy Arcana Codex. You have Advantage on any Intelligence (Arcana) check you make when you take the Study action to recall lore about spells, magic items, eldritch symbols, magical traditions, and planes of existence.

The Chronepsis Chronicles. You have Advantage on any Intelligence (History) check you make when you take the Study action to recall lore about historical events, legendary people, ancient kingdoms, past disputes, wars, and lost civilizations.

Investigations of the Inquisitive. You have Advantage on any Intelligence (Investigation) check you make when you take the Study action to make deductions based on clues or evidence or to recall lore about traps, ciphers, riddles, and gadgetry.

Material Musings on the Nature of the World. You have Advantage on any Intelligence (Nature) check you make when you take the Study action to recall lore about terrain, plants, animals, and the weather.

The Old Faith and Other Religions. You have Advantage on any Intelligence (Religion) check you make when you take the Study action to recall lore about deities, rites and prayers, hierarchies, holy symbols, and the practices of secret cults.

Enlarging the Facility. You can enlarge your Archive to a Vast facility by spending 2,000 GP. If you do so, you gain two additional reference books chosen from the list above.
translation:
13级据点设施

先决条件：无

空间：宽敞

雇员：1

指令：调查

档案馆是储存书籍、地图和卷轴的地方。它通常连接着一座图书馆，隔着一扇上锁的门或密门。

调查：有益学识。 当你对此设施下达调查指令时，你委托设施的雇员搜索档案馆，寻找需要的知识。这项工作需要7天时间。雇员将如同施展了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLegendLore]{通晓传奇} 法术那样获得相关的知识。在你下次和他对话时，雇员将这些知识传达给你。

参考书。 你的档案馆中存放了某本参考书的抄本，当你和这本书都位于据点内时，它会赋予你相应的好处。你可以从下列选项中选择一项（DM 可能会创作额外的选项）：

毕格比之手边奥术原典。 当你执行研究动作以回想有关法术、魔法物品、秘术符号、魔法传统以及存在位面的知识时，你所做的所有智力（奥秘）检定具有优势。

库若尼普斯编年史。 当你执行研究动作以回想有关历史事件、传奇人物、古代帝国、过去的冲突与战争以及失落的文明的知识时，你所做的所有智力（历史）检定具有优势。

调查员的调查报告。 当你执行研究动作以根据线索和证据进行推理，或者回想有关陷阱、密码、谜题以及小装置的知识时，你所做的所有智力（调查）检定具有优势。

对于世界本质的物质性思考。 当你执行研究动作以回想有关地形、植物、动物和天气的知识时，你所做的所有智力（自然）检定具有优势。

旧日信仰和其他宗教。 当你执行研究动作以回想有关神祗、仪式、祈祷、宗教制度、圣徽以及秘密邪教的行为的知识时，你所做的所有智力（宗教）检定具有优势。

扩大设施。 你可以花费 2000 GP，将档案馆扩大为庞大设施。这样做之后，你从上述列表中获得额外两本参考书。

Level 5 Bastion Facility

Prerequisite: None

Space: Roomy

Hirelings: 1

Order: Trade

An Armory contains mannequins for displaying armor, hooks for holding Shields, racks for storing weapons, and chests for holding ammunition.

Trade: Stock Armory. When you issue the Trade order to this facility, you commission the facility’s hireling to stock the Armory with armor, Shields, weapons, and ammunition. This equipment costs you 100 GP plus an extra 100 GP for each Bastion Defender in your Bastion. If your Bastion has a Smithy, the total cost is halved.

While your Armory is stocked, your Bastion Defenders are harder to kill. When any event causes you to roll dice to determine if your Bastion loses one or more of its defenders (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgBastions00000.JournalEntryPage.KiujX8sthhH791vM]{Bastion Events}), roll [[/r 1d8]] in place of each d6 you would normally roll. When the event is over, the equipment in your Armory is expended regardless of how many Bastion Defenders you have or how many you lost, leaving your Armory depleted until you issue another Trade order to the facility and pay the cost to restock it.

空间：宽敞

雇员：1

指令：贸易

军械库包含展示盔甲的假人、悬挂盾牌的挂钩、存放武器的架子以及储存弹药的箱子。

贸易：补充军械库。 当你对此设施下达贸易指令时，你委托设施雇员为军械库补充护甲、盾牌、武器和弹药。这些装备会花费你 100 GP，每有一个据点卫兵需要额外花费 100 GP。如果你的据点拥有铁匠铺，总价格将减半。

当你的军械库补充完毕后，你的据点卫兵会更难被杀死。当一个事件迫使你掷骰以决定自己是否失去了一个或更多的据点卫兵时（见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgBastions00000.JournalEntryPage.KiujX8sthhH791vM]{据点事件}），你投掷 [[/r 1d8]] 而非 d6。在该事件结束后，无论是否有据点卫兵损失，你储存的装备都会被消耗。这会导致你的军械库失去作用，直至你再次对其下达贸易指令来重新补货。

Space: Roomy

Hirelings: 1

Order: Recruit

A Bastion can have more than one Barrack, each of which is furnished to serve as sleeping quarters for up to twelve Bastion Defenders.

Recruit: Bastion Defenders. Each time you issue the Recruit order to this facility, up to four Bastion Defenders are recruited to your Bastion and assigned quarters in this Barrack. The recruitment costs no money. You can’t issue the Recruit order to this facility if it’s fully occupied.

Keep track of the Bastion Defenders housed in each of your Barracks. If you lose Bastion Defenders, deduct them from your roster. Assign names and personalities to your Bastion Defenders as you see fit.

5级据点设施

空间：宽敞

雇员：1

指令：招募

每个据点可以拥有多个兵营。每个兵营都安置了家具，可以作为至多十二名据点卫兵的宿舍。

招募：据点卫兵。 每当你对此设施下达招募指令，至多四位据点卫兵会被招募到你的据点，并被分配到这个兵营中。招募不会花费任何金钱。你不能在这个兵营已经满员的情况下对此设施下达招募指令。

记录下每个兵营中的据点卫兵。如果你损失了据点卫兵，从你的据点卫兵名单中划掉他们。你可以按自己的喜好为每个据点卫兵分配姓名和个性。

original:
Level 17 Bastion Facility

Prerequisite: Ability to use an Arcane Focus or a tool as a Spellcasting Focus

Space: Vast

Hirelings: 1

Order: Empower

A door up to 5 feet wide and 10 feet tall appears on a flat, solid surface in one of the other facilities in your Bastion. You choose the location. If you are in your Bastion during a Bastion turn, you can relocate this door to another facility in your Bastion.

Only you and your Bastion’s hirelings can open the door, which leads to a Demiplane that takes the form of a stone room. The Demiplane exists in an extradimensional space and therefore isn’t attached physically to other locations in your Bastion. Neither the Demiplane nor its door can be dispelled.

Empower: Arcane Resilience. When you issue the Empower order to this facility, magical runes appear on the Demiplane’s walls and last for 7 days. Until the runes disappear, you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to five times your level after spending an entire Long Rest in the Demiplane.

Fabrication. While in the Demiplane, you can take a Magic action to create a nonmagical object of your choice from nothing, causing it to appear in an unoccupied space in the Demiplane. The object can be no bigger than 5 feet in any dimension; can’t have a value over 5 GP; and must be made of wood, stone, clay, porcelain, glass, paper, nonprecious crystal, or nonprecious metal. You must finish a Long Rest before you can take this action again.

17级据点设施

先决条件：可以使用奥术法器或可以将工具作为施法法器

空间：庞大

雇员：1

指令：增强

一个至多5尺宽，10尺高的门出现在你据点里某个设施内的一个平坦，坚硬的表面。其位置由你选择。如果你位于你的据点内，你可以将这道门移动到另一个设施里。

只有你和你据点的雇员可以打开这扇门，它通往一个半位面，其形式类似于一个石质房间。半位面位于超维空间中，因此不在物理上与据点的其他部分相连。半位面本身和通往它的门都不能被解消。

增强：奥术活力。 当你对此设施下达增强指令时，魔法符文将在半位面的墙壁上浮现，持续7天时间。在符文消失前，如果你在半位面内进行了一整个长休，你将获得等同于你等级5倍的临时生命值。

造物。 位于半位面内时，你可以用一个魔法动作，凭空创造一个你所选择的非魔法物件。该物件会出现在半位面内的一个未被占据的空间。该物件不能在任何方向上超过5尺长，其价值不能超过5 GP，并且必须由木头、石头、黏土、陶瓷、纸张、无价值的水晶或者非贵重金属构成。你不能再次使用该魔法动作，直至你完成一次长休。

Space: Roomy

Hirelings: 1

Order: Harvest

A Greenhouse is an enclosure where rare plants and fungi are nurtured in a controlled climate.

Fruit of Restoration. One plant in your Greenhouse has three magical fruits growing on it.   • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCarpenters]{Carpenter's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulPaintersSu]{Painter's Supplies}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCobblersTo]{Cobbler's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulPottersToo]{Potter's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulGlassblowe]{Glassblower's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulTinkersToo]{Tinker's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulJewelersTo]{Jeweler's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulWeaversToo]{Weaver's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulLeatherwor]{Leatherworker's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulWoodcarver]{Woodcarver's Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulMasonsTool]{Mason's Tools}

Craft Options. When you issue the Craft order to this facility, choose one of the following options:

Craft: Adventuring Gear. The facility's hirelings craft anything that can be made with the tools you chose when you added the Workshop to your Bastion (see above), using the rules in the Player's Handbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{Crafting Magic Items}

Craft: Magic Item (Implement). If you are level 9+, you can commission the facility's hirelings to craft a Common or an Uncommon magic item chosen by you from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItemList.JournalEntryPage.1asrgLIXBkZK96Uz#implements-tables]{Implements tables}. The facility has the tool required to craft the item, and the hirelings have proficiency with that tool as well as proficiency in the Arcana skill. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{Crafting Magic Items} for the time and money that must be spent to craft the item. If the item allows its user to cast any spells from it, you must craft the item yourself (the facility's hirelings can assist), and you must have all those spells prepared every day you spend crafting the item.

Source of Inspiration. After spending an entire Short Rest in your Workshop, you gain Heroic Inspiration. You can't gain this benefit again until you finish a Long Rest.

Enlarging the Facility. You can enlarge your Workshop to a Vast facility by spending 2,000 GP. If you do so, the Workshop gains two additional hirelings and three additional Artisan's Tools (chosen from the list above).

空间： 宽敞

工匠工具： 工坊被加入据点时，其内有六种工匠工具可以投入使用。从下述列表中进行选择：

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCarpenters]{木工工具}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulPaintersSu]{画家工具}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCobblersTo]{鞋匠工具}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulPottersToo]{陶艺工具}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulGlassblowe]{玻璃匠工具 }
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulTinkersToo]{修补工具}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulJewelersTo]{珠宝匠工具}

制造选项：当你对此设施下达制造指令时，从以下选项中选择一项：

制造：冒险装备：设施雇员制造任意能用工坊内已有的工匠工具（见上文）制造的物品，使用玩家手册中的相关规则。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{制造魔法道具}

制造：魔法物品（器具）如果你的等级达到或高于 9 级，你可以委托此设施的雇员制造一件由你选择的普通或非普通魔法物品，该物品必须来自第 7 章的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItemList.JournalEntryPage.1asrgLIXBkZK96Uz#implements-tables]{器具表格}。此设施拥有制造该物品所需的工具，而其雇员拥有该工具的熟练以及奥秘技能的熟练。参考第 7 章“ @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgMagicItems000.JournalEntryPage.CmKJpbyrDuVrAkIs]{制造魔法物品} ”一节来决定制造该物品所需的时间与金钱。如果该物品允许使用者用它施展任何法术，你必须亲自制造它（设施雇员可以协助你），并且在制造该物品期间，你每天都必须准备所有该物品可以施展的法术。

灵感之源： 当你在工坊内完成一次完整的短休后，你获得英雄激励。你在完成一次长休前不能再次获得此增益。

扩大设施：你可以花费 2000 GP ，将工坊扩大为庞大设施。这样做之后，工坊获得额外两位雇员以及额外三种工匠工具（从上述列表中选择）。
